text: (gentle music)

- [Narrator] Graviton processors
are custom designed by AWS,

to enable up to 40%
better price performance.

Tens of thousands of
customers of all sizes

have already adopted AWS
Graviton based instances,

and realized significant
price performance benefits
for their applications.

Graviton based instances are
also highly energy efficient,

using up to 60% less energy
for the same performance
than comparable instances in AWS.

Graviton based instances
are available in Amazon EC2,

as well as many managed
services, including AWS Fargate,
AWS Lambda, Amazon Aurora, Amazon RDS,
Amazon EMR and Amazon ElastiCache.
The AWS Graviton fast start program

helps you get started with
AWS Graviton based instances.

It provides step-by-step
content to help you prep,

benchmark, and move a wide
variety of applications,

including serverless,
big data, containerized,

database and casheing workloads,
in as little as four hours.

On top of that, Graviton
fast start also offers access

to experts in each of
the featured services,
helping you overcome any potential issues.

Gain superior performance
for your workloads quickly

and easily with the AWS
Graviton fast start program.
(gentle music)
